title: Asparagus Empire The Green Gold Rush

tasks.task: Preparing an asparagus field for planting.
subtasks: Selecting and storing one-year-old asparagus crowns.
Planting the crowns in rows within the field.
Monitoring asparagus growth daily.
Using specialized machinery to cut asparagus stalks at the base.
Ensuring soil remains undisturbed around the plant to promote regrowth.
Checking the field for signs of pests or diseases.
Executing timely interventions such as irrigation or fertilization as needed.
Clearing debris or weeds from the rows.
Driving or maneuvering the machinery used for cutting and maintaining the field.

tasks.task: Final answer is MAINTASKs as listed. }
Preparing an asparagus field for planting.
MAINTASK: Prepare the asparagus field for planting
subtasks: Select and store one-year-old asparagus crowns
Plant the crowns in rows within the field
Monitor asparagus growth daily
Use specialized machinery to cut asparagus stalks without damaging the plant
Ensure soil remains undisturbed to promote regrowth
Check for pests and diseases
Apply irrigation or fertilization as needed
Clear debris or weeds from the rows
Drive or maneuver the machinery used for cutting and maintenance

tasks.task: Prepare the asparagus field for planting**
subtasks: Select and store one-year-old asparagus crowns.
Plant the crowns in rows within the field.
Monitor asparagus growth daily (since they grow up to 10 inches per day).
Use specialized machinery to cut asparagus stalks without damaging the plant.
Ensure soil remains undisturbed around the plant to promote regrowth.
Check for pests and diseases.
Apply irrigation or fertilization as needed.
Clear debris or weeds from the rows.
Drive or maneuver the machinery used for cutting and maintaining the field.
